abstract: The company has stopped providing information to the public about how many copies of each book it had in stock.
snippet: The company has stopped providing information to the public about how many copies of each book it had in stock.
lead_paragraph: Authors who monitor sales of their books online were dealt a bit of a blow last month, when Amazon.com stopped providing information to the public about how many copies of each book it had in stock.

headline.main: Amazon Drops Inventory Data, Irking Writers
headline.print_headline: Amazon Drops Inventory Data, Irking Writers
